Module com.electra.canbusdemo
Package com.electra.canbusdemo.CANbus

Class CANbus_Protocol

java.lang.Object
com.electra.canbusdemo.CANbus.Protocol
com.electra.canbusdemo.CANbus.CANbus_Protocol
public class CANbus_Protocol extends Protocol
This Protocol is an abstraction layer that allows to interaction with any of the supported device via the given hardware peripheral. Adapt the general format of an instruction into a suitable send and receive\ byte commands available on the Driver services.

This file contains the implementation of the CANbus Protocol.

Property: E-Lectra s.r.l.

  • Method Details

    • startReceiverThread

      public void startReceiverThread()
      This method is called in order to start the receiverThread.

      In order to ensure that only one receiverThread is running at time, we check the value of the boolean variable stoppedReceiverThread if:

      • true: we set stoppedReceiverThread to false and start the receiverThread.
      • false: return.

    • stopReceiverThread

      public void stopReceiverThread() throws InterruptedException
      This method is called in order to stop the running receiverThread.

      Before return, waits the termination of the current receiverThread via the Thread.join() method.

      Throws:
      InterruptedException
